result.eng: Read the word at the beginning of the sentence.
result.ga: Léigh an focal ag tús na habairte
result.orig: Léigh an focal ag tús na habairte
result.html: Léigh an focal ag tús na habairteRead the word at the beginning of the sentence.
result.ponchtml: Léiġ an focal ag tús na habairteRead the word at the beginning of the sentence.

result.eng: The translator should not only read the text carefully but do a bit of research as well.
result.ga: B'fhearr don aistritheoir ní amháin an téacs a léamh go cúramach ach roinnt taighde a dhéanamh chomh maith
result.orig: B'fhearr don aistritheoir ní amháin an téacs a léamh go cúramach ach roinnt taighde a dhéanamh chomh maith
result.html: B'fhearr don aistritheoir ní amháin an téacs a léamh go cúramach ach roinnt taighde a dhéanamh chomh maithThe translator should not only read the text carefully but do a bit of research as well.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟearr don aistriṫeoir ní aṁáin an téacs a léaṁ go cúramaċ aċ roinnt taiġde a ḋéanaṁ ċoṁ maiṫThe translator should not only read the text carefully but do a bit of research as well.

result.eng: Many a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.
result.ga: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na bliana
result.orig: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na bliana
result.html: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na blianaMany a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.
result.ponchtml: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo naċ léann leaḃar ar biṫ ó ċeann ceann na blianaMany a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.

result.html: Níor léigh mé riamh éI have never read it.
result.ponchtml: Níor léiġ mé riaṁ éI have never read it.

result.ga: Is maith liom bheith ag léamh
result.orig: Is maith liom bheith ag léamh
result.html: Is maith liom bheith ag léamhI like to read.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom ḃeiṫ ag léaṁI like to read.

result.eng: I like to read and I love playing music.
result.ga: Is maith liom bheith ag léamh agus is breá liom bheith ag seinm ceoil
result.orig: Is maith liom bheith ag léamh agus is breá liom bheith ag seinm ceoil
result.html: Is maith liom bheith ag léamh agus is breá liom bheith ag seinm ceoilI like to read and I love playing music.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom ḃeiṫ ag léaṁ agus is breá liom ḃeiṫ ag seinm ceoilI like to read and I love playing music.

result.eng: Have you read everything these authors have written?
result.ga: Ar léigh tú gach ar scríobh na húdair seo
result.orig: Ar léigh tú gach ar scríobh na húdair seo
result.html: Ar léigh tú gach ar scríobh na húdair seoHave you read everything these authors have written?
result.ponchtml: Ar léiġ tú gaċ ar scríoḃ na húdair seoHave you read everything these authors have written?

result.eng: They gave the Irish-language community something to read.
result.ga: Chuir said ábhar léitheoireachta ar fáil do phobal na Gaeilge
result.orig: Chuir said ábhar léitheoireachta ar fáil do phobal na Gaeilge
result.html: Chuir said ábhar léitheoireachta ar fáil do phobal na GaeilgeThey gave the Irish-language community something to read.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir said áḃar léiṫeoireaċta ar fáil do ṗobal na GaeilgeThey gave the Irish-language community something to read.
